name: Wake Up (itch) (School for Games)
description:
Wake Up is a 3D First Person Platformer for PC. The player’s goal is to end a coma dream in order to wake up. You achieve this goal by navigating through the levels by changing states of objects either by indirect or direct influence.

Meet the Team:

  • Kathleen S. - Lead/ 2D/3D Artist
  • Chiara C. - 2D /  VFX Artist
  • Luisa R. - UI / UX Artist
  • Viktoriya K. - 3D Artist
  • Michael R. - Game Design
  • Leon S. - Game Programming
  • David A. - Game Production
  • Jeremy F. - Title Music
  • Marcus  - Title Music
